Active record join senza relazione
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/15230568/how-to-make-active-record-join-to-return-unique-objects
User.joins(:orders).
    where("orders.created_at >= '2013-01-01 00:00:00'").
    group('users.id')

http://weasyprint.org/
http://template2pdf.com/
https://www.latex-project.org/latex3/
https://htmlpdfapi.com/blog/free_html5_invoice_templates  (template di esempio)
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8345857/css-print-layout-printing-on-a-single-page (tutto in una pagina)
https://tech.small-improvements.com/2013/03/11/good-layout-for-printing-websites-without-pdf-media-print/  (conigli sulla stampa)
http://www.yourinspirationweb.com/2014/01/27/guida-html5-immagini-outlines/
https://davidwalsh.name/css-page-breaks  (nascondere blocco pagina e interruzione)
https://davidwalsh.name/optimizing-structure-print-css
http://www.evopdf.com/demo/HTML_to_PDF/Page_Breaks/Insert_Page_Breaks_Before_After_Using_CSS.aspx  (esempi interessanti su come preparare le stampe)

per avviare rails da iphone:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/29132719/rails-application-not-visible-to-local-network
rails server --binding=0.0.0.0  #avviare il server in questo modo per essere fruibile da iphone
ping lo recuperi da utility network
esempio da lucchetta :
192.168.1.115:3000  (senza http://)
192.168.0.2 casa
